html:
PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2023-02912023-03-27PSPC
ActFinancial Administration Act
SubjectCanada Lands Company Limited's 2023-24 to 2027-28 Corporate Plan and 2023-24 Operating and Capital Budgets
PrecisOrder (1) authorizing the Old Port of Montréal Corporation Inc. to (i) enter into up to 25 leases in 2023-24, having individual values of up to $6,500,000.00 per year and a total value of up $240,000,000.00, and (ii) retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2023-24 to 2027-28 planning period; and (2) authorizing Parc Downsview Park Inc. to (i) enter into up to 25 leases in 2023-24, having individual values of up to $4,000,000.00 per year and a total value of up to $20,000,000.00, and (ii) retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2023-24 to 2027-28 planning period.
AttachmentsAttachment
subject: Canada Lands Company Limited's 2023-24 to 2027-28 Corporate Plan and 2023-24 Operating and Capital Budgets
precis: Order (1) authorizing the Old Port of Montréal Corporation Inc. to (i) enter into up to 25 leases in 2023-24, having individual values of up to $6,500,000.00 per year and a total value of up $240,000,000.00, and (ii) retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2023-24 to 2027-28 planning period; and (2) authorizing Parc Downsview Park Inc. to (i) enter into up to 25 leases in 2023-24, having individual values of up to $4,000,000.00 per year and a total value of up to $20,000,000.00, and (ii) retain and use any associated proceeds, if the leases are consistent with activities and projections presented in the corporate plan for the 2023-24 to 2027-28 planning period.
